name: Myrmidon's helm, fortified with impenetrable dark steel
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
